scripts.prepare: husky install; rm -rf .husky/pre-push; husky add .husky/pre-push 'yarn run hook:pre-push'; rm -rf .husky/_/.gitignore
scripts.fresh-test: kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:6545); ganache -p 6545 &>/dev/null && truffle migrate --reset --network fresh_test && truffle deploy --network fresh_test && truffle test --network fresh_test
scripts.auto-generate-docs: checkSolFilesInCommits.sh && yarn run generate-docs && git add docs/ && git commit -m 'auto: updated docs' -z &>/dev/null
scripts.lint: shellcheck bin/*; cspell lint --gitignore '**/{*,''}{.,''}*'; solhint '**/*.sol'; prettier '**/{*,''}.{json,js,sol}' --check; eslint '**/{*,''}.{json,js}';
scripts.hook:pre-push: shellcheck bin/* && cspell lint --gitignore '**/{*,''}{.,''}*' && solhint '**/*.sol' && prettier '**/{*,''}.{json,js,sol}' --check && eslint '**/{*,''}.{json,js}' && yarn run fresh-test && yarn run auto-generate-docs
